metadata.synopsis: Party banter between Halsin and Lae'zel at the Counting House

2.speaker: Halsin
2.text: Such hoarding of wealth. A tomb for riches that could be put to better use.

0.speaker: Lae'zel
0.text: I've heard the same said of bears - the kind you take the shape of. They hoard, gorge, and hibernate through hard times.

1.speaker: Halsin
1.text: True... but only until the thaw, then life goes on. This gold may never see daylight again, while others go cold and hungry.
